TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. you get the first plane ever invented by the wright bros.

I wish for the world to Have a giant jet engine on the other side to escape the world ending.

Granted. The intake for the giant jet consumes the atmosphere and we all die gasping.

I wish we still used pennies here.

Granted, the cost of producing pennies cannot cover the amount being produced, thus increasing your countries deficit.

I wish all countries would abandon the penny.

Granted, and the world implodes due to the unacceptance of the most beautiful thing in the world.

I wish that Buran flew more than once.

Granted. It explodes on the second flight, sending a spray of shrapnel that shuts down baikonur.

I wish I didn't need contact with humans to stay alive and sane.

granted. now you are locked in an impenetrable box.

I want a cake

Granted. The cake is a lie.

I wish I didn't have to deal with stupid people all day.

Granted. Now everyone is absurdly disrespectful.

I wish I could be in the Kerbal universe.

Granted, but now you are one of Danny's victims.

I wish that this wish would get corrupted.

Granted, you broke the game.

I wish this statement was false.

Granted, you dirty rotten liar.

I wish that dropping logic bombs would make the bomb dropper's head explode.

Granted. Any form of logic that is dispensed will result in explosion of head. Humans slowly evolve to say illogical things.

I wish for a mining unit.

Granted, but it can only mine 1 nanometer holes for only 3 meters.

I wish i had a girlfriend

Granted. She's the biggest jerk the earth has ever seen, and you can't break up with her because she knows dirty little secrets that could've get you to jail.

I wish I was a god.

Yeah but your only believed by a atheist

I wish everyone gets a sweet roll (now stop lolly gagging)

Edited February 15, 2015 by CG_Kerbin

Granted. everyone gets a sweet massive cinnamon bun.

I wish for a giant floating super mario galaxy-ish observatory.

Granted. Due to failure in its propulsion system it falls, killing you in the process.

I wish to be friends with HAL 9000.

I'm afraid I can't do that.

I wish Jeb was real.

EDIT: Nooo! Ninja'd!

Granted, Jeb is real now. He crashes a rocket into a city. Because of this, all funding of space programs is now suspended.

Granted. However, he thinks you will endanger the mission, so he kills you. The mission is more important than friends.

I wish to be friends with a friendly super-intelligent AI that makes sure no harm I do not want is done to me.

Granted. The AI befriends you,but suddenly a circuit freaks and it becomes evil.

I wish for a Giant cake.

Granted. It is a cake made of Giants. The families of those Giants come to avenge them and destroy all of humanity.

I wish for a silicon monocrystal.

Granted, I misread your wish, and so you got a silicone monocrystal.

I wish all good things didn't have to come to an end.

Granted. They never begin.

I wish there was no Jar-Jar in star wars.

Granted, but there are thousands of copies with different names.

I wish that I had a nice plate of pancakes in front of me right now. Tasty ones, too!

Granted. They spontaneously explode from being where air also is.

They're still pretty tasty on the ground, though.

I wish for the Joker.
